format:\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n{CollectionName.modes.ModeName.Group.Subgroup.Variable}\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\nExample chain:\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\nGreenshift.Light.Preset.Color.brand\n  â†’ {Semantic.modes.Light.Color.Brand.Default}\n    â†’ {Primitives.modes.Default.Color.Emerald.400}\n      â†’ #34d399\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n### API Response Format\n&#96;&#96;&#96;typescript\ninterface TokenResponse {\n  collection: string;\n  mode?: string;\n  tokens: Token[];\n  metadata: {\n    count: number;\n    types: string[];\n    lastUpdated: string;\n  };\n}\n\ninterface Token {\n  path: string;           // \"Color.Emerald.400\"\n  name: string;           // \"Emerald 400\"\n  value: string | number; // \"#34d399\" or 24\n  type: string;           // \"color\" | \"number\"\n  cssVariable: string;    // \"--primitives-color-emerald-400\"\n  reference?: string;     // \"{Primitives.modes.Default.Color.Emerald.400}\"\n  wpVariable?: string;    // \"--wp--preset--color--brand\"\n}\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n### CSS Variable Naming Convention\n- Primitives: &#96;--primitives-{group}-{name}-{shade}&#96;\n- Semantic: &#96;--semantic-{category}-{role}&#96;\n- Components: &#96;--component-{component}-{property}&#96;\n- Greenshift: &#96;--wp--{preset|custom|style}--{path}&#96;\n\n---\n\n## ğŸ“ Session Notes\n\n### {\n    setColors(prev =&gt; ({ ...prev, [key]: value }));\n  };\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    if (!previewRef.current) return;\n    const style = previewRef.current.style;\n\n    // Update colors\n    style.setProperty('--color-brand', colors.brand);\n    style.setProperty('--color-brand-hover', colors.brand);\n    style.setProperty('--color-secondary', colors.secondary);\n    style.setProperty('--color-secondary-hover', colors.secondary);\n    style.setProperty('--color-accent', colors.accent);\n    style.setProperty('--card-bg', colors.cardBg);\n    style.setProperty('--card-border', colors.cardBorder);\n    style.setProperty('--color-background', colors.background);\n    style.setProperty('--button-bg', colors.brand);\n    style.setProperty('--button-bg-hover', colors.brand);\n\n    // Update border radius\n    style.setProperty('--card-border-radius', borderRadius);\n    style.setProperty('--radius-button', borderRadius);\n    style.setProperty('--radius-card', borderRadius);\n    style.setProperty('--input-border-radius', borderRadius === '24px' ? spacingMultiplier}rem&#96;);\n    style.setProperty('--gap-md', &#96;${1 * spacingMultiplier}rem&#96;);\n    style.setProperty('--gap-lg', &#96;${1.5 * spacingMultiplier}rem&#96;);\n    style.setProperty('--gap-xl', &#96;${2 * spacingMultiplier}rem&#96;);\n\n    // Card padding based on density\n    style.setProperty('--card-padding', &#96;${1.5 * spacingMultiplier}rem&#96;);\n\n  }, Educational Visualization\n**Goal**: Help users build a mental model of the token system architecture.\n\n- **Token Flow Diagram**: Visual representation showing how a hex value flows through layers\n- **Cascade Highlighting**: When a semantic color is selected, highlight which components inherit from it\n- **Reference Tracing**: Click any component to see its full token reference chain\n\n### 2. Color Palette Builder\n**Goal**: Enable users to create harmonious palettes using the primitive color library.\n\n#### Semantic Color Mapping\nFor each semantic color slot (Brand, Secondary, Background, etc.):\n- **Primitive Picker**: Dropdown to select base color group (Blue, Emerald, Violet, etc.)\n- **Shade Slider**: Adjust between shades (50-950) with visual feedback\n- **Color Preview**: Live swatch showing selected color with hex/CSS variable\n\n#### Supported Semantic Slots\n- &#96;Brand&#96; (Default, Hover, Light, Dark)\n- &#96;Secondary&#96; (Default, Hover, Light)\n- &#96;Background&#96; (Default, Alt)\n- &#96;Surface&#96;\n- &#96;Text&#96; (Foreground, Muted, Subtle)\n- &#96;Border&#96; (Default, Strong)\n- &#96;Status&#96; (Success, Warning, Error, Info)\n\n### 3. consistency\n\n---\n\n## ğŸ”§ Technical Notes\n\n### Token Reference Format\nTokens reference each other using this path format:\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n{CollectionName.modes.ModeName.Group.Subgroup.Variable}\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\nExample chain:\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\nGreenshift.Light.Preset.Color.brand\n  â†’ {Semantic.modes.Light.Color.Brand.Default}\n    â†’ {Primitives.modes.Default.Color.Emerald.400}\n      â†’ #34d399\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n### API Response Format\n&#96;&#96;&#96;typescript\ninterface TokenResponse {\n  collection: string;\n  mode?: string;\n  tokens: Token[];\n  metadata: {\n    count: number;\n    types: string[];\n    lastUpdated: string;\n  };\n}\n\ninterface Token {\n  path: string;           // \"Color.Emerald.400\"\n  name: string;           // \"Emerald 400\"\n  value: string | number; // \"#34d399\" or 24\n  type: string;           // \"color\" | \"number\"\n  cssVariable: string;    // \"--primitives-color-emerald-400\"\n  reference?: string;     // \"{Primitives.modes.Default.Color.Emerald.400}\"\n  wpVariable?: string;    // \"--wp--preset--color--brand\"\n}\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n### CSS Variable Naming Convention\n- Primitives: &#96;--primitives-{group}-{name}-{shade}&#96;\n- Semantic: &#96;--semantic-{category}-{role}&#96;\n- Components: &#96;--component-{component}-{property}&#96;\n- Greenshift: &#96;--wp--{preset|custom|style}--{path}&#96;\n\n---\n\n## ğŸ“ Session Notes\n\n### #### Component Specifications

- âœ… Brand Color shows: `CSS Variable: --color-brand`

format:\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n{CollectionName.modes.ModeName.Group.Subgroup.Variable}\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\nExample chain:\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\nGreenshift.Light.Preset.Color.brand\n  â†’ {Semantic.modes.Light.Color.Brand.Default}\n    â†’ {Primitives.modes.Default.Color.Emerald.400}\n      â†’ #34d399\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n### API Response Format\n&#96;&#96;&#96;typescript\ninterface TokenResponse {\n  collection: string;\n  mode?: string;\n  tokens: Token[];\n  metadata: {\n    count: number;\n    types: string[];\n    lastUpdated: string;\n  };\n}\n\ninterface Token {\n  path: string;           // \"Color.Emerald.400\"\n  name: string;           // \"Emerald 400\"\n  value: string | number; // \"#34d399\" or 24\n  type: string;           // \"color\" | \"number\"\n  cssVariable: string;    // \"--primitives-color-emerald-400\"\n  reference?: string;     // \"{Primitives.modes.Default.Color.Emerald.400}\"\n  wpVariable?: string;    // \"--wp--preset--color--brand\"\n}\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n### CSS Variable Naming Convention\n- Primitives: &#96;--primitives-{group}-{name}-{shade}&#96;\n- Semantic: &#96;--semantic-{category}-{role}&#96;\n- Components: &#96;--component-{component}-{property}&#96;\n- Greenshift: &#96;--wp--{preset|custom|style}--{path}&#96;\n\n---\n\n## ğŸ“ Session Notes\n\n###
